official_title: Improving Decision-Making Encounters in Lung Cancer (I DECide) II: A Randomized Control Trial Of A Low-Literacy Conversation Tool
inclusion_criteria:
* AIM 1: Suspected lung cancer
* AIM 1: English fluency
* AIM 1: > 6-month life expectancy
* AIM 1: Score of â‰¥ 3 on the cognitive impairment screener
* AIM 2 PARTICIPANTS: Participation in Aim 1
* AIM 2 CLINICIANS: Discussing lung cancer treatment decisions with Aim 1 participants
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 99 Years
